Articles.Content:
Hello,

I am choninja21 the leader of Kerbal Imperial Astronautics in the series Kerbal Corp Wars. For those who don't know, KCW is a stock battle series using Dark Multiplayer in order to pick up where Macey Dean's "Spirit of Kerban" series left off. Click HERE for more details.

However, we've run into a bit of a problem: a number of you want to join in on the action but there aren't any spots available. Never fear! A solution was found: Subsidiaries.

What are Subsidiaries, you may ask? Well, subsidiaries are small companies within larger companies that are specialists or have other purposes in this case design ships.

That's where you come in! If you want to be apart of Kerbal Corp Wars, please follow the directions below.

Submission Rules:

  1. Stock parts only. No exceptions.
  2. Ships must be designed for space (no atmospheric or rovers at this time, but you can still design them)
  3. The only unarmed ships allowed are carriers and support ships
  4. Submissions must be posted in as a reply to this thread and must include:

  • The name of the corp you would like to design for (Kerbal Imperial Astronautics, Phoenix Corp, or Szilard Scientific (the warmonger, the peacekeeper, and the scientist respectively))
  • Picture or pictures of your work
  • The name of your subsidiary

After you have submitted your craft, one of us will private message you as soon as possible if you have been selected as an official subsidiary. Then you'll work out the details with your parent corp. If you get a message, private message me (choninja21) so that I can hook you up with the required documents and such.

We are looking forward to your submissions!

Happy building,

choninja21 (for the rest at Kerbal Corp Wars)

Edited December 4, 2014 by choninja21
Clarity

Hello,

I am choninja21 the leader of Kerbal Imperial Astronautics in the series Kerbal Corp Wars. For those who don't know, KCW is a stock battle series using Dark Multiplayer in order to pick up where Macey Dean's "Spirit of Kerban" series left off. Click HERE for more details.

However, we've run into a bit of a problem: a number of you want to join in on the action but there aren't any spots available. Never fear! A solution was found: Subsidiaries.

What are Subsidiaries, you may ask? Well, subsidiaries are small companies within larger companies that are specialists or have other purposes in this case design ships.

That's where you come in! If you want to be apart of Kerbal Corp Wars, please follow the directions below.

Submission Rules:

  1. Stock parts only. No exceptions.
  2. Ships must be designed for space (no atmospheric or rovers at this time, but you can still design them)
  3. The only unarmed ships allowed are carriers (subject to change)
  4. Submissions must be posted in as a reply to this thread and must include:

  • The name of the corp you would like to design for (Kerbal Imperial Astronautics, Phoenix Corp, or Szilard Scientific (the warmonger, the peacekeeper, and the scientist respectively))

Then you'll work out the details with your parent corp. If you get a message, private message me (choninja21) so that I can hook you up with the required documents and such.

We are looking forward to your submissions!

Happy building,

choninja21 (for the rest at Kerbal Corp Wars)

I might have something, My Adraxia class cruiser, It's small I agree but it's loaded with AP missiles, it's also got a crew of 2 with room for an extra 4.

The ship can go to any corporation who is looking to use it, B.I.R.C (Bill's Independent Research Congregations) likes to sell for a discount and/or give away vessels to corporations looking to increase the prosperity of the Outer Rim (planets at the edge of the solar system like Jool and Dres) however will also sell ships to other various corporations that are not associated with the Outer Rim. We are not fans of the military as they always seem to bully the inhabitants of the Outer Rim.

(Ignore the fuel tanks in the background, due to a cockup on my part that launch stage no longer works and thus is not distributed with the ship)

Armament is 7x Lightning Mk-II missiles, each capable of significantly wounding a capital ship.

Propulsion is x4 NERVA's and x1 LVT-30

Hope this suffices XD

P.S I Coudl also upgrade it to carry yet more weapons if need be.

P.S 2 - Forgot to say we would like to be a subsidiary of the KIA, As such ships to them will be free of cost, or whatever you guys decide, XD

Edited December 23, 2014 by Caldari Navy

Okay, here we have 2 more ships, both of which are specialised

So first is the Lyndra class Siege Frigate, In essence it's a planet bomber, but that is all it's good at, in order to keep costs and parts down it has no armor and very few ship to ship weapons, however it does carry 2 siege missiles.

Download -

And next up we have the Tribuke class Torpedo Frigate, this ship, is certainly not the most nimble of frigates but it does utilise 2 Anti-Ship torpedo launchers aswell as 4 Lightning Mk-II missiles, a very good frigate in ship to ship engagements.

Download - http://www./download/lu9g2fofd4plggc/Tribuke+Class+Torpedo+Corvette.craft

Hope these also suffice.

P.S Just remembered, as for the Siege frigate, I recommend using the missiles like actual landers and deorbiting them that way, the only problem is I'm a terrible pilot and as such I cant even plot where the missile are going to land on planets with atmosphere, so yeah just throwing that out there XD
